item.title: Doomed, We are All Doomed I Say!
item.description: Just to set things straight, the title of this post has nothing to do with US politics, but the infinitely more important (and exciting) subject of transactions in SQL Server and the concept of doomed transactions. Why I came across the idea for this post was due to a discussion I had with a colleague of mine - Sameer Chunilall - who didn’t agree with my post a while ago about XACT_ABORT, he believes it is a good thing (mostly), where I believe it is a bad thing (mostly).
